text: Ara tomadera ki halo ye, tomara allahara pathe byaya karacha na? Athaca asamanasamuha o yaminera mirasa [1] to allah‌ra'i. Tomadera madhye yara bijayera age byaya kareche [2] o yud'dha karache, tara (ebam parabartira) samana naya [3]. Tara maryadaya srestha tadera ceye yara parabarti kale byaya kareche o yud'dha kareche. Tabe allah‌ ubhayera jan'ya'i kalyanera pratisruti diyechena [4]. Ara tomara ya kara allah‌ se samparke sabisesa abahita
